documentation.text:
@title DonationContract
 @dev A smart contract for accepting donations in a crowdfunding campaign.

@dev Emitted when an anonymous donation is received.
 @param amountToWithdraw The amount of the donation.

@dev Emitted when the campaign ends.
 @param campaignAddress The address of the campaign

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The donation value must be greater than zero"

arguments.value: The donation value must be greater than zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The donation value must be greater than zero"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Campaign must be live for at least 24 hours"

arguments.value: Campaign must be live for at least 24 hours

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Campaign must be live for at least 24 hours"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The amount requested must be greater than zero"

arguments.value: The amount requested must be greater than zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The amount requested must be greater than zero"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The donation value must be greater than zero"

arguments.value: The donation value must be greater than zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The donation value must be greater than zero"

documentation.text:
@notice Fallback function to accept anonymous donations.
 @notice if after this transaction the campaign reaches its full amount requested, campaign ends

@notice Function that allows users to make a donation.
 @notice if after this transaction the campaign reaches its full amount requested, campaign ends

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The campaign can not be closed"

arguments.value: The campaign can not be closed

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The campaign can not be closed"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The campaign did not reach the required amount"

arguments.value: The campaign did not reach the required amount

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The campaign did not reach the required amount"

documentation.text:
@notice Function to withdraw donations by the campaign creator.
 Only possible if the campaign reaches its full requested amount in donations.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The campaign reached the required amount"

arguments.value: The campaign reached the required amount

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The campaign reached the required amount"

devdoc.details: A smart contract for accepting donations in a crowdfunding campaign.

Donation(address,uint256).details: Emitted when a donation is received.

UnknownDonation(uint256).details: Emitted when an anonymous donation is received.

closeCampaign().details: Can be called by anyone. Total amout reached can also close the campaing but does this automatically

params._amountRequesting: The total amount requesting in the campaign.
params._campaignEndTime: The timestamp when the campaign ends.
params._campaignIpfs: The IPFS hash for campaign details.
params._campaignReceiver: The address of the campaign receiver.

refund().details: If the campaign is not able to reach its full requested amount in the given time, then  the donators are able to get their donations back

devdoc.title: DonationContract

afterFee(uint256,uint8).notice: this calculates the amount left after the fee and the amount that is taken with the fee in this case is the platform the suffers with the division (math floor) with the max lost  beign fee - 1

closeCampaign().notice: Closes the campaignAllows campaign reciever to withdraw, if successAllows donators to cashback, if not successTransfers the fees to the admistrator

constructor.notice: it has to be the platform to deploy the contract

donate().notice: Function that allows users to make a donation.if after this transaction the campaign reaches its full amount requested, campaign ends

refund().notice: get your donation back, after the end of campaign, if it failed to reach its objective

withdrawDonations().notice: Function to withdraw donations by the campaign creator. Only possible if the campaign reaches its full requested amount in donations.
